item.title: HTB UNI CTF - Cloud - Epsilon Writeup
item.description: Intro One of the local shops in your city is realising new costumes. Go grab them before they run out as the available stock is very limited. TLDR Port 80 exposed public .git folder, dump it Found aws access key, use to get lambda function Found jwt secret key for app, use this to get admin login SSTI in app endpoint /order, get RCE and flag Recon Nmap Open 10.
